@00h
1     lmr $F     "enable interrupts
1010111111000000


@01h
2     ldi 0,#0    "r0 <= 0
1010010000000000
0000000000000000


@03h
3     add 0,#0    "r0 <= 0 throws zero interrupt
0001110000000000
0000000000000000


@05h
4     ldi 0,#$7F  "r0 <= $7F
1010010000000000
0111111100000000


@07h
5     add 0,#1    "r0 <= $80 (-128) overflow
0001110000000000
0000000100000000


@09h
6
